name: Pest Control (itch) (goodolvic)
description:
Blast your way through the spider horde! Eat cheese and eject it back at the eight-legged enemies! Navigate the dark depths to the thrashing melody of metal! Flee to the freedom of fresh air!

Developed in the first months of the pandemic as a study of Unity and level design, composed of assets created by the following folks:

Art

  • Halloween Cemetery Set by 3dfancy
  • Fuga spiders with destructible eggs and Mummy by Bizulka
  • Stones and buried treasure by Comeback
  • HuMan 3D Project [Animated/HandPainted]Male by Milos Baskic
  • Animated low poly spider by Cattleya
  • Low Poy Hand Painted Rat by YGS Assets
  • Game Prop Pack 1 by TogaMario
  • Mouse Running Cliparts #2517772
  • Castle Bricks by Max Garant
  • Archive of free textures Library
  • low angle photography of green grass field under blue cloudy sky with daytime, corn HD wallpaper
  • Body Splatter Parts by VIS Games

Sound

  • Cue - Dark-Crazy-Fast-Psycho-Metal (7 Trips Insane) by Soularflair
  • Space Insect by Breviceps
  • Cartoon - Bat / Mouse Squeak by Breviceps
  • Mumbling male (short) by pfranzen
  • soul- death by ludist
  • wind, basement, dripping water by mario1298
  • Munching Sound by Roland Katarn
  • Splat by JustInvoke
